hero.description: Streamline bookings, manage finances, and organize events with our comprehensive dashboard designed specifically for venue owners.

products.title: Our Solutions
products.subtitle: Tools built for the future of event management

webApp.title: Venue Management System
webApp.description: The powerful web-based command center for your venue. Handle bookings, staff, finance, and client communications in one secure place.

mobileApp.title: Client Mobile App
mobileApp.description: A seamless experience for your clients to discover venues, make reservations, and manage their event details on the go.

features.title: Why Choose Fiesta?
features.subtitle: Designed to solve the real challenges of venue management

centralized.title: Centralized Control
centralized.description: Stop juggling notebooks and spreadsheets. Get a visual calendar, automated invoices, and team scheduling in one dashboard.

financial.title: Financial Insights
financial.description: Track revenue, expenses, and profitability per event. Generate professional reports with a single click.

marketplace.title: Built-in Marketplace
marketplace.description: Showcase your venue to thousands of potential clients. Receive inquiries directly into your management system.

detail.description: Fiesta isn't just a calendar. It's a complete business suite designed to help you scale. Manage your entire venue from a single screen, accessible from anywhere.

centralized.title: Centralized Command
centralized.description: View bookings, pending inquiries, and daily schedules at a glance.

financial.title: Financial Management
financial.description: Track deposits, payments, and generate automated invoices effortlessly.

customization.title: Custom Configurations
customization.description: Set dynamic pricing, manage multiple spaces, and define staff roles.

howItWorks.title: How Fiesta Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get your venue up and running in minutes

createAccount.title: Create Account
createAccount.description: Sign up as a venue owner, event planner, or service partner

setupProfile.title: Setup Profile
setupProfile.description: Complete your profile with photos, services, and availability

configureCalendar.title: Configure Calendar
configureCalendar.description: Set your availability and pricing rules.

startManaging.title: Start Managing
startManaging.description: Receive bookings and manage events efficiently.

pricing.title: Get Custom Pricing
pricing.description: Every venue and service provider has unique needs. Contact our sales team to get a personalized quote that fits your business size and requirements.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Fiesta

systemAvailable.q: Is the Web Management System available now?
systemAvailable.a: Yes! The Venue Management System is live and ready to help you manage your business.

mobileAppRelease.q: When will the Mobile App be released?
mobileAppRelease.a: We are currently in the final stages of development. Join our waitlist to be notified when it launches.

getStarted.a: Simply book a demo with our team. We'll walk you through the platform, help you set up your account, and provide training to ensure you get the most out of Fiesta.

support.q: What kind of support do you provide?
support.a: We provide comprehensive support including onboarding training, phone support, email support, and a detailed knowledge base. Our team is here to ensure your success.

contact.title: Ready to Optimize Your Venue?
contact.subtitle: Contact our team today to learn how Fiesta can transform your business.

contracts.title: Contracts
contracts.desc: Define legal terms, clauses, and branding for client and partner agreements.

invoices.title: Invoices
invoices.desc: Set up billing preferences, tax rates, and payment instructions.

description.line1: Ditch the notebook and the messy Excel sheets. Fiesta gives you a professional digital command center.
description.line2: Start for free, upgrade when you grow.

problem.title: Is your venue running you, or are you running your venue?

doubleBookings.title: Double Bookings
doubleBookings.description: The nightmare of explaining to a client that their date was accidentally given to someone else.

lostPayments.title: Lost Payments
lostPayments.description: Forgetting who paid the deposit, who owes the balance, and losing track of expense receipts.

messyContracts.title: Messy Contracts
messyContracts.description: Word documents that look unprofessional and take 30 minutes to edit for every new client.

features.title: Everything You Need to Succeed
features.subtitle: From the first inquiry to the final invoice.

calendar.title: Smart Calendar
calendar.description: Visual schedule management with conflict detection.

finance.title: Financial Suite
finance.description: Invoices, expense tracking, and profit reports.

legal.title: Auto-Contracts
legal.description: Generate legal contracts in one click.

calendar.title: Never Double Book Again
calendar.description: The core of your business is the calendar. Our system prevents you from booking two events at the same time. You can see your schedule by Month, Week, or Day.

finance.title: Know Your Numbers
finance.description: Stop guessing your profit. Track every dinar coming in and going out. Create professional PDF invoices that impress your clients.

legal.title: Legal Protection Made Easy
legal.description: Contracts protect your business, but they are a pain to write. Fiesta auto-fills your standard contract with the event details instantly.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start for free. Upgrade only when you need the power tools.

freeForever.q: Is the free version really free forever?
freeForever.a: Yes. If you only need to manage your calendar and client list, you will never have to pay. We hope you grow enough to need the Pro features later!

dataSecurity.a: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption. Unlike a physical notebook, you can't lose your data if you lose your phone.

dataExport.a: Yes, Pro users can export financial reports and client lists to Excel or PDF at any time.

cta.title: Ready to professionalize your venue?
cta.description: Join hundreds of Tunisian venue owners who are saving time and making more money with Fiesta.
